repairedDockerfile:
# Debian: essential 
# 
# VERSION 0.1 
# Pull the base image. 
FROM debian:jessie 

MAINTAINER Easywelfare <dev@easywelfare.com> 

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y \
vim \
curl \
git \
wget \
dnsutils \
htop && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

RUN apt-get clean 
RUN rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /tmp/* /var/tmp/* 

ENTRYPOINT ["/bin/bash"] 

CMD []
